option.name: originalContent
option.value:
# Configuration Docker pour Order Service spring.application.name=notification-service server.port=8086
# Base de données PostgreSQL en container spring.datasource.url=jdbc:postgresql://postgres-notification:5432/brokerxdb_notification spring.datasource.username=postgres spring.datasource.password=postgres spring.datasource.driver-class-name=org.postgresql.Driver
spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=none spring.jpa.show-sql=true spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.format_sql=true
# Configuration email spring.mail.host=smtp.gmail.com spring.mail.port=587 spring.mail.username=hugovaillant1234@gmail.com spring.mail.password=cjtt axua viep gojy spring.mail.properties.mail.smtp.auth=true spring.mail.properties.mail.smtp.starttls.enable=true
spring.flyway.enabled=true spring.flyway.locations=classpath:db/migration spring.flyway.validate-on-migrate=false spring.flyway.out-of-order=true
# Configuration des endpoints Actuator et métriques Prometheus management.endpoints.web.exposure.include=health,info,metrics,prometheus management.endpoint.health.show-details=always management.endpoint.health.probes.enabled=true management.endpoint.metrics.enabled=true management.endpoint.prometheus.enabled=true
# Métriques personnalisées avec tag application management.metrics.tags.application=${spring.application.name}
# Configuration pour communication avec l'API Gateway en Docker gateway.url=http://api-gateway:8079
# Configuration JWT jwt.secret=your-256-bit-secret-key-for-development-change-in-production-please jwt.expiration=86400000
# URL de base de l'application app.base-url=http://notification-service:8086
# Configuration RabbitMQ pour Docker spring.rabbitmq.host=rabbitmq spring.rabbitmq.port=5672 spring.rabbitmq.username=guest spring.rabbitmq.password=guest spring.rabbitmq.virtual-host=/
# Configuration des queues et exchanges messaging.exchange.order=order.exchange messaging.exchange.matching=matching.exchange messaging.exchange.notification=notification.exchange messaging.queue.order-placed=order.placed.queue messaging.queue.order-matched=order.matched.queue messaging.queue.order-rejected=order.rejected.queue messaging.queue.notification-send=notification.send.queue messaging.routing-key.order-placed=order.placed messaging.routing-key.order-matched=order.matched messaging.routing-key.order-rejected=order.rejected messaging.routing-key.notification-send=notification.send

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Configuration Docker pour Order Service spring.application.name=notification-service server.port=8086
# Base de données PostgreSQL en container spring.datasource.url=jdbc:postgresql://postgres-notification:5432/brokerxdb_notification spring.datasource.username=postgres spring.datasource.password=postgres spring.datasource.driver-class-name=org.postgresql.Driver
spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=none spring.jpa.show-sql=true spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.format_sql=true
# Configuration email spring.mail.host=smtp.gmail.com spring.mail.port=587 spring.mail.username=hugovaillant1234@gmail.com spring.mail.password=cjtt axua viep gojy spring.mail.properties.mail.smtp.auth=true spring.mail.properties.mail.smtp.starttls.enable=true
spring.flyway.enabled=true spring.flyway.locations=classpath:db/migration spring.flyway.validate-on-migrate=false spring.flyway.out-of-order=true
# Configuration des endpoints Actuator et métriques Prometheus management.endpoints.web.exposure.include=health,info,metrics,prometheus management.endpoint.health.show-details=always management.endpoint.health.probes.enabled=true management.endpoint.metrics.enabled=true management.endpoint.prometheus.enabled=true
# Métriques personnalisées avec tag application management.metrics.tags.application=${spring.application.name}
# Configuration pour communication avec l'API Gateway en Docker gateway.url=http://api-gateway:8079
# Configuration JWT jwt.secret=your-256-bit-secret-key-for-development-change-in-production-please jwt.expiration=86400000
# URL de base de l'application app.base-url=http://notification-service:8086
# Configuration RabbitMQ pour Docker spring.rabbitmq.host=rabbitmq spring.rabbitmq.port=5672 spring.rabbitmq.username=guest spring.rabbitmq.password=guest spring.rabbitmq.virtual-host=/
# Configuration des queues et exchanges messaging.exchange.order=order.exchange messaging.exchange.matching=matching.exchange messaging.exchange.notification=notification.exchange messaging.queue.order-placed=order.placed.queue messaging.queue.order-matched=order.matched.queue messaging.queue.order-rejected=order.rejected.queue messaging.queue.notification-send=notification.send.queue messaging.routing-key.order-placed=order.placed messaging.routing-key.order-matched=order.matched messaging.routing-key.order-rejected=order.rejected messaging.routing-key.notification-send=notification.send

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: ALTER TABLE walletEntity RENAME TO wallet;

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: ALTER TABLE stock_rule ADD COLUMN price DECIMAL(18,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
